title: Fix segment-to-template mapping in sales initiation recommendations (positioning block insertion)

sections.text: Sales initiation recommendations are sometimes applying the wrong outreach template and/or inserting the wrong Customer_Analyzer positioning block when an account’s segment is missing, stale, or changes. Update the template selection logic to deterministically resolve the account’s current segment, apply the correct template + positioning block for that segment, and fall back to a safe default template when no segment/block is available. Add a regression test covering segment change and missing segment/block scenarios.
